attributes.action: Protection of all family units as a whole against all forms of: ostracism,separation & eugenics.Whole family and community inclusion paramount.
attributes.additional_details: Work with the whole family.Inhouse intensive therapy for families only.Social workers,local authorities,local and national government to regain our trust.Stop taking children away from parents.Change laws.Don't impose one rule fits all,don't impose on families restrictions on their faith/religion/culture/​heritage/race.Combat speculative judgement and flimsy probabilities on parents and combat non evidence based fact.Rehabilitate don't punish parents.Make public family courts.Condone sex amongst children.Ban it till age of 18, speak against a system that has taken away rights of parents.Don't nanny parents and family.  Stop the interference of the state,Local authorities and schools on families. Do away with Gillick and fraser competence.Strike a balance struck between an amended childrens act 1989  and the rights of a parent.Be consultative and representative  across the board.Take better care of the elderly.Let people decide how they run their lives.
